description: Create a single clump from the balls within range or add a ball to an existing clump. The balls are transformed to clump pebbles and are removed from the container of balls.

create.description: Create a clump from the balls within range

add-pebble.description: Add balls within range to an existing clump

modifiers.name: calculate
modifiers.description: Calculate clump position, volume, and inertia from pebble distribution (tolerance default 0.01, min 0.00005). Cannot use with position/inertia/volume keywords.

modifiers.name: group
modifiers.description: Assign group name to clump (or pebbles if 'pebble' keyword used)

modifiers.name: id
modifiers.description: Clump ID (required for add-pebble, auto-assigned for create if not specified)

modifiers.name: inertia
modifiers.description: Set clump inertia tensor. Must also specify volume. Cannot use with calculate.

modifiers.name: position
modifiers.description: Clump centroid position (default origin). Cannot use with calculate.

modifiers.name: volume
modifiers.description: Set clump volume for mass calculation. Must also specify inertia. Cannot use with calculate.

examples.command: ball clump create range id 1 10 calculate
examples.description: Create clump from balls 1-10, automatically calculate properties from pebble distribution

examples.command: ball clump create range group 'ballgroup' density 2500 calculate 0.001
examples.description: Create clump from ball group with density 2500, high precision calculation (0.1% tolerance)

examples.command: ball clump add-pebble id 5 range id 20
examples.description: Add ball 20 as pebble to existing clump 5

examples.command: ball clump create range box -5 5 position (0,0,0) density 1000 calculate
examples.description: Create clump from balls in box region with specified density

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('ball clump ...') - Python SDK cannot convert balls to clump pebbles
